<noinclude>{{month: ** The [[Fellowship of the Ring]] is led through [[Lothlórien

The text mentions that Frodo sees the "sickle Moon". According to astronomy, this moon should really be exactly half-full in 3019, rather than sickle, eight days after the full moon.<ref>http://shire-reckoning.com/moon.html</ref>
